name: Spellbook of Fireball
description: A leather-bound spellbook containing the knowledge to cast the powerful Fireball spell.
looks: The spellbook is made of aged leather with intricate runes etched into the cover. The pages are yellowed with age, but the text is still clear and legible.

special_effects.fireball_spell: Allows the user to cast the powerful Fireball spell, dealing fire damage to enemies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that has potent healing abilities.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings of swirling vines. At the top of the staff, there is a glowing crystal that emits a soft, healing light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Enhances healing abilities, providing a chance to heal an additional amount of HP.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A mystical staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of dark wood with intricate carvings of elemental symbols. It glows with a faint ethereal light.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.elemental_fury: 20% chance to deal double damage with elemental attacks.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger coated with a deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a slim blade with a wicked curve. The handle is wrapped in worn leather, creating a comfortable grip.

special_effects.poisoned_blade: Has a chance to poison the target, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial filled with a miraculous healing liquid.
looks: The vial is made of glass and contains a shimmering blue liquid. It has a small cork stopper to keep the liquid secure.

name: Enchanted Sword

looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the elemental forces of fire, water, air, and earth.
looks: The staff is made of a sturdy material with four colored orbs embedded at the top. Each orb represents a different element and glows with a faint light.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.elemental_fury: 20% chance to deal double damage with elemental attacks.
